channel.title: 508 Error
channel.description:
i am trying to add dragonfire sheilds operate on a espeon server. which is soo hard. keep getting this 1-9 errors. i removed the attack when if you are far away from player and you use operate and click attack, the dragonfire blazes toward the opponent and hits them. or can someone please give your operate code for dfs or tell me how to fix this error.
[code]Compiling all files.... .
et\com\espeon
et\packethandler\ItemOperate.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : variable p2 location: class net.com.espeon.net.packethandler.ItemOperate if(p2.appendHit(Misc.random(32), 0)); ^ Note: .
et\com\espeon
et\SocketListener.java uses unchecked or unsafe operatio ns. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

You need to declare the p2 parameter.
